property.name: Move existing fighters to new carriers

property.value:
============================================

--------------= ATARI =--------------

<
====================1.3=====================
============================================

Its The 8.December 1941 The Japanese Plan to Conquest
Space For Living begins.
General Masaharu Homma and General Hisaichi Terauchi
Are Assigned to Bring Victory to the Japanese Imperator.
Defeat Is Out of Question...

===================Units====================

--------------Attack/Defend/Movement/Cost/Ability-------------

----------------------------Land Units----------------------------

Infantry - 1 / 2 / 1 / 2
Elite - 2 / 2 / 1 / 3
Scout - 2 / 1 / 2 / 3 Two Scouts One Trans.
Artillery - 2 / 2 / 1 / 4 Support
Truck - 1 / 2 / 3 / 4
Halftrax - 2 / 2 / 3 / 6 Support / Blitz
Armour - 3 / 3 / 2 / 5
Bunker - 0 / 3 / 0 / 0 Two Hit
AAGun - 0 / 1 / 0 / 5
Factory - 0 / 0 / 0 / 15

-----------------------------Air Units-----------------------------

EarlyFighter- 2 / 3 / 4 / 8
Fighter - 3 / 4 / 4 / 10
LongrangeFighter- 3 / 4 / 6 / 12
Bomber - 4 / 1 / 6 / 15 Strat.Bomb
NakajimaG5N - 5 / 2 / 8 / 20 Strat.Bomb (B29/Lancaster)

-----------------------------Sea Units-----------------------------

TorpedoBoat - 2 / 1 / 1 / 6
Transport - 0 / 1 / 2 / 8
Big Transport - 0 / 1 / 2 / 12 4 Inf/1Inf3Armour
Submarine - 2 / 2 / 2 / 8
Destroyer - 3 / 3 / 2 / 12
Carrier - 1 / 3 / 2 / 16
Big Carrier - 1 / 3 / 2 / 25 3Fighters/ Two Hit
Cruiser - 3 / 3 / 2 / 14 Bombard
Heavy Cruiser - 4 / 4 / 2 / 18
Battleship - 4 / 4 / 2 / 24 Bombard / Two Hit

================Special Rule=================

In Round 12 US Gets Support From One Of Its
Sea Zones (Only If He Controls One).
Units Should Be EDITED By US

UNITS

1 Battleship
1 B.Carrier + 3 E.Fighters
1 Submarine
1 Cruiser
2 Transports



=================Turn Order==================

-------- G.Hisaichi // G.Masaharu // U.S // Phil. // Brits -------

-----------------------TECH ISNT AKTIV-----------------------

================Let There Be War==============

===================SIEG=====================
